survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer awareness and behaviors related to home energy efficiency, including adoption of energy-saving practices and technologies.

questions.question_text: How concerned are you about your home's energy consumption?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure concern levels. Ensure options are balanced and cover the full range of possible responses.

script.question_text: How concerned are you about your home's energy consumption?

questions.question_text: Which of the following energy-efficient practices have you implemented in your home? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multiple-choice question to gauge adoption rates of common energy-saving practices. Include an option for 'None of the above'.

script.question_text: Which of the following energy-efficient practices have you implemented in your home? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason for implementing energy-efficient practices in your home?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 is not 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for respondents to specify their reason.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason for implementing energy-efficient practices in your home?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 is not 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in Q3, please specify your primary reason.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Other' is selected in Q3
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture unique responses not covered in the predefined options.

script.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in Q3, please specify your primary reason.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Other' is selected in Q3

questions.question_text: How likely are you to invest in additional energy-efficient upgrades for your home in the next 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure likelihood. Helps predict future adoption trends.

script.question_text: How likely are you to invest in additional energy-efficient upgrades for your home in the next 12 months?

questions.question_text: Which of the following barriers prevent you from adopting more energy-efficient practices? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q5 is not 'Very likely'
questions.client_notes: Multiple-choice question to identify common barriers. Include 'Other' for unique responses.

script.question_text: Which of the following barriers prevent you from adopting more energy-efficient practices? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q5 is not 'Very likely'

questions.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in Q6, please specify the barrier.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Other' is selected in Q6
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture unique barriers not covered in the predefined options.

script.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in Q6, please specify the barrier.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Other' is selected in Q6

questions.question_text: Have you ever participated in a government or utility-run energy efficiency program?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge program awareness and participation.

script.question_text: Have you ever participated in a government or utility-run energy efficiency program?

questions.question_text: If you participated in such a program, how satisfied were you with the experience?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Yes' is selected in Q8
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels among program participants.

script.question_text: If you participated in such a program, how satisfied were you with the experience?
script.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Yes' is selected in Q8

questions.question_text: What additional information or resources would help you make more energy-efficient decisions for your home?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to identify unmet needs for education or support.

script.question_text: What additional information or resources would help you make more energy-efficient decisions for your home?
